textBox.richText: It has taken me hundreds of hours to put up what is on here so far, and I know I am not close to done. The scope of the site to this point has been too wide - a hazard of studying the history of the world. What I have done today is remove all the human rights pages that did not yet have content, and I will leave that field to others more experienced than I. Instead, I intend to focus on my areas of strength, modern world history, genocide and teaching. Those pages are about eighty-percent finished, and will hopefully be complete by the end of the year. 234 pages with initial content, and only 68 to go! As you have probably noticed, the podcast is delayed. I have written the first two podcasts, a short introduction and one on why study history, but I am waiting on equipment, so recording probably won’t start until the first week of the new year.
